item.title: CVE-2017-2698|2024-08-05T14:02:07.355Z -- huawei%20technologies%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- p8
item.description: The ddr_devfreq driver in versions earlier than GRA-UL00C00B197 has buffer overflow vulnerability. An attacker with the root privilege of the Android system can tricks a user into installing a malicious application on the smart phone, and send given parameter to smart phone to crash the system or escalate privilege.
